metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_7d0a0477
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_7d0a0477.pdf

content:
朋友们，我们又见面了。让我们拉拉手，轻轻地说一声： “ 你好！ ” 我将再次牵着你的手，跟你一起走进英语学习的大门，去向小鸟学习唱歌，去跟蓝天白云对话，去了解一片迷人的新天地，去结识更多的新朋友。 我们将进入一个美好、神奇的儿童乐园。在这里，我们会融入种种奇妙的情景中，学唱英语歌和英语童谣，学做游戏和画画，还要演一些简单的英语小品，参加一些英语比赛。在这些活动中，你会自然地、愉快地学会说英语，并记住许多英语单词。 你会发现，英语课是你最喜欢的课程。你就是课堂的小主人。老师和同学一样，是一个平等的对话者。我敢肯定，你还会不时地拿起教鞭，神气十足地当起小老师。 你的英语说得那么棒，你的英语歌唱得那么美，你的出色表现，一定会得到老师的鼓励，同学们的赞美。在逐步提高英语听说能力的同时，你的英语读写能力也会得到初步的发展，从而为进一步的学习打好基础。那时候，你就能用英语跟 “ 老外 ” 交谈，用英语在超市购物，你还能用英语给外国小朋友写信，让他们和你一起分享成功和快乐吧！ 当然，在学习中你也会遇到困难。但不要忘了，还有我这个朋友哦！ 我向你保证，我会永远帮助你、支持你。我们会永远在一起体验快乐，迸发热情，增长知识，健康成长。 嗨！你准备好了吗？ 让我们开始吧！ look listen say, talk, chant, read, tell number, draw, link, match, tick, write, choose, fill in, cross, circle practise, do, play, act sing cultural clips colour learn point 
Contents Page Unit 1 Days of a Week 1 Unit 2 Our Favourite Sports 12 Unit 3 At the Table 23 Review 1 34 Unit 4 Our Houses 39 Unit 5 Our New Rooms 50 Review 2 61 Words in Each Unit 65 Word List 67 Children ’ s Garden 70

content: 3 4. Listen and chant When do you have music? On Monday and Wednesday , but we listen and sing every day. When do you have art? On Tuesday and Thursday , but we draw and paint every day. When do you have PE? On Wednesday and Friday , but we run and jump every day. Come on! Try to make new chants with Monday , Tuesday , Wednesday , Thursday , Friday … 1) We have art on Mondays. 2) We have PE on Wednesdays. 3) We have music on Fridays. 4) We have IT on Tuesdays. 5) We have science on Thursdays. 5. content: 11 11 On Monday, Mum cuts the toast into two rectangles ( 长方形 ) . On Tuesday, Mum cuts the toast into two triangles ( 三角形 ) . On Wednesday, Mum cuts the toast into four small triangles. On Thursday, Mum cuts the toast into four small squares ( 正方形 ) . Mum doesn’t cut the toast on Friday. On Saturday, Stanley makes the toast for his mother. He makes rectangles, triangles and squares. Mum smiles happily. OK. Here is it. One big square today. Oh, I like them all. Mum, what shape ( 形状 ) do you like best? Sat. Story Corner Sat. Sat. Fri. Wed. Thur. Tue. Mon. Listen and enjoy the story Try to act out the story with your friends

content: 22 A duckling lives by a pond. His name is Bobby. Every day, Bobby goes to the pond with his mother. A=Mother B=Bobby Mother always swims in the pond. Bobby always sits on the bank. B: The water is cold. I don’t like it . Every day, Mother swims in the pond. Every day, Bobby sits on the bank. A: Look out, Bobby! A big cat is coming to you. B: Help! Help, Mother! A: Jump! Jump down! A: You’re safe now. The cat can’t get here. It can’t swim. B: But I can swim now. A: Yes, you can swim now. A: Bobby, it’s time to learn swimming . Story Corner Listen and enjoy the story Try to act out the story with your friends

content:
33 Aha, what a nice morning! Happy New Year, Mr. Brown! Happy New Year, Rabbit! I bring you some vegetables . Thanks, Mr. Brown. Happy New Year, Pig! I bring you some bread and potatoes . Thanks, Mr. Brown. Happy New Year, Cat and Dog! I bring you some fish and chicken. Many thanks! I bring some rice for Hen. But where is she? She’s in the coop ( 鸡舍 ) . Happy New Year, Hen! I bring you some rice. Many thanks, Mr. Brown! I have some presents for you, too. Story Corner Listen and enjoy the story Try to act out the story with your friends 33

49 Mary is looking for h er ca t Jelly. Mary: Jelly! Meow! Where are you? Mum: Go to the study. Mary: No, it’s not in the study. Mum: Go to your bedroom, then. Mary: Meow! I’m coming, you lazybones (懒骨头) ! Mary: Boo! Oh, it’s a toy dog. Mary: Mm… maybe, it’s in the living room. Mary: No, it’s not in the living room. Where are you, Jelly? Mum: Come here, Mary! Come into the kitchen. Look up！ Mary: Oh, you naughty cat! Jelly: Meow! Meow! Story Corner Listen and enjoy the story Try to act out the story with your friends 49

content: 60 Merry Christmas, Dad and Mom. Merry Christmas, children. Go fi nd your presents. But, where is my present? Try under the table. No, it is not under the table. Yes, it is under the sofa. Open your presents and see. What? Is it a doll for me? Oh, sorry. It’s not for you. It’s for Lucy. Ha! Ha! Ha! How funny! Yeah! Look at my present. It’s in the Christmas tree. Try under the sofa. Story Corner Listen and enjoy the story Try to act out the story with your friends 60

content: 67 A about …………………… 关于（ 4 ） after ……………… 在……后（ 2 ） any ……… 任何的，任一的（ 5 ） B bad …………………… 坏的（1） bathroom ………… 卫生间（4） be （ am , is , are ） … 有，存在（2） be good at …………… 擅长于（2） bed ………………………… 床（5） bedroom ………………… 卧室（4） behind ……………… 在……后（4） between ………… 在……中间（4） bike （ =bicycle ） …… 自行车 （1） box ……………………… 盒子（5） bread …………………… 面包（3） C chicken ………………… 鸡肉（3） clock ……………………… 钟（5） computer …………… 计算机（5） cup ……………………… 茶杯（5） D day ……………… 一天，一日（1） dining room …………… 饭厅（4） door ……………………… 门（5） E easy ………… 容易的，轻易的（2） every ………… 每一个，每个（1） F favourite （ AmE favorite ） ………… 心爱的，特别喜爱的（2） fine …………………… 晴朗的（1） fish ……………… 鱼肉； 钓鱼 （3） floor …………………… 地板（5） fly ………………… 飞；飞翔 （1） fly a kite …………… 放风筝（1） Friday ………………… 周五（1） G go boating ……………… 划船（2） go fishing ……………… 钓鱼（2） go skating ……………… 滑冰（2） 词汇表 （注：黑体单词要求学生能听、说、读、写； 其他单词只作听、说、认读要求。) 注：词汇后括号内的数字为单元序号。 Word List

content:
Tuesday ………………… 周二（1） TV ……………………… 电视（5） U umbrella ……………… 雨伞（5） us ……………… （宾格）我们（2） V vegetable ………………… 蔬菜（3） W want ……………… 要，想要（2） Wednesday …………… 周三（1） week ……………… 周，星期（1） well …………………… 好，对（4） window …………………… 窗（5） with …………………… 和，同（1） word ……………… 单词，字（1） would like ……………… 想要（3） 69 
Song time 70 Let’s sing and play Children’s Garden Draw this. Colour it. Write the days. Cut it out. Play with your friends. What day is it today? Spell it. Tuesday. T-u-e-s-d-a-y. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Tuesday 
71 Show time Let’s read and act out A Magic Flower Morning, Jenny! How nice! How sweet! Good morning, Mr. Baker! What would you like for breakfast today? Seven donuts, please. How dare you, naughty dog! Bow-wow! Bow-wow!

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_7d0a0477
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_7d0a0477.pdf

content:
72 Mm, where’s the dog? Where’s my home? Mum! Dad! (Crying) Thank you, Granny! But how? Don’t cry, little Jenny. I have a flower for you. It can help you get home. Tear off one petal (花瓣) and say, “Petal, petal, fly away. I want to…” Petal, petal, fly away. I want to go home. I’ll put the magic flower into the vase. 
73 Is anything wrong, Jenny? No, nothing, Mum! Petal, petal, fly away. I want to make Mum’s vase nice ． Jenny, go and play in the yard. OK, Mum. Boys, may I join you? No. You are a girl. Going to the North Pole is a boys’ game. 74 74 Br-r-r-r, how cold! Girls, may I play with you? No. We don’t want to play with you. Petal, petal, fly away. I want to go to the North Pole. Oh, petal, petal, fly away. I want to be home. 
75 Petal, petal, fly away. I want to have all the toys in the world! Oh, no! Petal, petal, fly away. I want to have all the toys go away. I have only one petal now. I’ll make good use of the last one.

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_7d0a0477
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_7d0a0477.pdf

content:
76 Vitya, let’s go play together. Come on! Let’s go play! Oh! I can stand up! Petal, petal, fly away. I want to make Vitya healthy. I would be glad to, but I’m lame. 
77 Show time! ? 
78 Best Wishes 
79 To You
